info.title: Sovrane API
info.description: API documentation for the Sovrane application

get.description: Returns paginated audit log entries.

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: Include events up to this date.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of departments.

post.description:
Creates a new department within a site. Authentication with
administrator privileges is required.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific department.

post.description: Modify a department's label, parent, manager or permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the department to update.

delete.description:
Permanently deletes a department. The operation fails if users are
still attached. Requires administrator privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the department to delete.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of departments that have the given department as parent.
Returns the user managing the department.

post.description:
Assigns a user as the manager of the department. Requires
administrator privileges.

requestBody.description: User identifier to set as manager.

delete.description:
Clears the manager of the department. The caller must be authenticated
as an administrator.

get.description: Returns the parent department if any.

post.description:
Defines the parent department for hierarchical organization. Requires
administrator privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the department to update.

requestBody.description: Identifier of the new parent department.

delete.description:
Detaches the department from its current parent. Administrator
authentication is required.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of permissions attached to the department.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter permissions by key or description.

post.description:
Grants a specific permission to the department. Administrator
authentication is required.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the department to update.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of users belonging to the department.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter by user name or email.

post.description:
Attaches an existing department as a child of another department.
Requires authentication with administrative rights.

parameters.name: childId
parameters.description: Identifier of the child department to attach.

delete.description:
Detaches a child department from its parent. Authentication and
administrative privileges are required.

parameters.name: childId
parameters.description: Identifier of the child department to detach.

delete.description:
Revokes a previously granted permission from the department.
Administrator authentication is required.

parameters.name: permissionId
parameters.description: Identifier of the permission to remove.

post.description:
Adds an existing user to the specified department. Requires
administrative privileges.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Identifier of the user to attach.

delete.description:
Removes the association between a user and a department. Requires
administrator authentication.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Identifier of the user to detach.

post.description: Creates a new user group with the authenticated user as the responsible user.

requestBody.description: Data for the new user group.

get.description: Returns all user groups.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term on the group name.

get.summary: Get a user group by id.
get.description: Retrieves a single user group.

put.description: Updates group information. Only the responsible user can modify it.

delete.description: Removes a group if the requester is responsible user.

get.description: Returns the paginated members of the specified group.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term on the user name.

post.description: Adds a user to the group. Only the responsible user can manage members.

delete.description: Removes a user from the group. Only the responsible user can manage members.

get.summary: List responsible users of a group.
get.description: Returns the paginated list of responsible users managing the group.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term on the user name.

post.description: Adds a user as responsible for the group. Only an existing responsible user can manage responsibles.

requestBody.description: User identifier to add as responsible.

delete.description: Removes a responsible user from the group. Only an existing responsible user can manage responsibles.

requestBody.description: User identifier to remove from responsible users.

get.description: Retrieves the invitation details linked to the provided token. Used to validate the invitation and pre-fill onboarding fields.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The invitation token from the activation link.

post.summary: Invite a new user by email
post.description: Sends an invitation email with an activation link to a new user. Only administrators can invite users.

requestBody.description: Email and optional details for the invited user.

409.description: User already exists or invitation already sent.

get.description: Returns the list of all permissions.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term on key or description.

post.description:
Registers a new permission in the system. Only authenticated
administrators should use this endpoint.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific permission.

put.description: Modify the key or description of an existing permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the permission to update.

delete.description: Deletes an existing permission. It should no longer be referenced by any role before calling this endpoint.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the permission to delete.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of roles.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term on the role label.

post.description:
Registers a new role grouping a set of permissions. Requires
authentication and administrative rights.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific role.

put.description: Modify the label or permissions of an existing role.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the role to update.

delete.description:
Deletes a role. The operation fails if users are still associated with
it. Requires administrative privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the role to delete.

400.description: Deletion failed because the role is still in use

get.description: Returns the list of all sites.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term on the site label.

post.description:
Adds a new physical site to the system. Authentication is required and
the caller must have administrator privileges.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific site.

put.description: Modify the label of an existing site. Requires administrator privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the site to update.

delete.description:
Deletes a site. The operation fails when users or departments are still
attached to it. Requires administrator privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the site to delete.

400.description: Operation failed due to existing attachments

post.description:
Creates a user account for a new participant. This endpoint is open
to unauthenticated clients and is typically used during onboarding.
The returned `refreshToken` allows requesting a new access token.

requestBody.description: Data describing the user to create.

201.description: Newly created user profile with authentication tokens.

get.description: Returns a paginated and filterable list of users.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter users by name or email.

post.summary: Authenticate a user with email and password.
post.description:
Validates the provided credentials and returns the corresponding user
profile if the login succeeds. The `refreshToken` can be used to
obtain a new access token when the short lived one expires.

requestBody.description: Email and password used to authenticate.

403.description: User account is suspended or archived

423.description: Account temporarily locked due to failed attempts

example.error: Account is temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts.

post.description: Exchanges a valid refresh token for a new access token.

requestBody.description: Refresh token previously issued by the API.

post.summary: Authenticate a user with an external provider.
post.description:
Exchanges a provider issued token (e.g. OAuth) for a local session and
returns the associated user profile.

200.description: User successfully authenticated with the provider

403.description: User account is suspended or archived

post.description: Sends a password reset link to the provided email address.

requestBody.description: Email address of the account requesting a reset.

204.description: Reset request processed, no content returned

post.description:
Completes the password reset process using a valid reset token and the
new password provided.

requestBody.description: Reset token and the new password.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific user.

put.description:
Updates information about an existing user. Authentication is required
and only authorized administrators should call this endpoint.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the user to update.

delete.description:
Permanently deletes a user account. This operation cannot be undone
and requires administrative privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the user to delete.

get.description:
Retrieves information about the authenticated user. A valid bearer
token must be supplied in the `Authorization` header.

put.description:
Updates the account status (active, suspended or archived) of a user.
Requires administrator privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the user to update.

post.description: Uploads an avatar image for the specified user. Requires authentication.

delete.description: Deletes the avatar of the specified user if present.

Site.description: Physical location where users and departments operate.

Permission.description: Authorization item representing an allowed action.

permissionKey.description: Machine readable key for the permission.

description.description: Human readable explanation of the permission.

Department.description: Organizational unit grouping users within a site.

parentDepartmentId.description: Identifier of the parent department if applicable.

managerUserId.description: Identifier of the user managing this department.

site.description: Site where the department is located.

UserGroup.description: A group of users with a responsible user and members.

members.description: List of users in the group.

Role.description: Collection of permissions that can be assigned to users.

User.description: Application user with profile and access information.

email.description: Email address used for communication and login.

site.description: Site where the user is located.

picture.description: Optional URL of the profile picture.

lastLogin.description: Timestamp of the user's last successful login.

lastActivity.description: Timestamp of the user's last activity (login or token refresh).

permissions.description: Permissions granted directly to the user.
